name: ETIP ZEP
goal:
The objectives of ETP ZEP are:
- Advising on CCS as a key technology for combating climate change for all CO2 emitting industries, including energy intensive industry, hydrogen producers and producers of biofuels
- Supporting efforts to make CCS an investible technology by 2020
- Accelerating next generation RD&D of CCS technology and the widespread deployment post 2020
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Policies to combat climate change and to reduce the emissions of CO2, specifically using Carbon Capture and Storage and Carbon Capture and Utilisation
